amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the CBP Air/Marine Interdiction, Operations, Maintenance, and Procurement account by $32 million offset by reducing funds for the Office of Under Secretary and Management and the Science and Technology Management Administration accounts by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management and increase funds for U.S. Customs and Border Protection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 256 (Roll no. 388).
